{% macro form_field(field, type) %} {% if field.flags.required %}{{ field.label }} (*) {% else %}{{ field.label }} {% endif %} {% if type == 'text' %}{{ field(size=32, class='form-control') }} {% elif type == 'cmnd' %}{{ field(class='form-control', data_inputmask="'mask': ['999.999.999', '999.999.999.999']", data_mask='') }} {% elif type == 'phone' %}{{ field(class='form-control', data_inputmask="'mask': ['0999.999.999', '+99 999.999.999']", data_mask='') }} {% elif type == 'date' %}{{ field(class='form-control', data_inputmask_alias='datetime', data_inputmask_inputformat='dd/mm/yyyy', data_mask='') }} {% endif %} {% if field.errors %} {% for error in field.errors %} {% endfor %} {% endif %} {% endmacro %}
